collections.name: Core/Always-On
collections.description: Always included in all indices. Universal kernel competencies essential for all users.
collections.notes: This collection cannot be modified or deleted. It forms the foundation for all custom selections. Contains only kernel competencies that appear in every collection.

collections.name: Developer Persona
collections.description: Competencies for software developers: code review, testing, quality improvement, and Git workflow management.

collections.name: Business Analyst / Product Manager
collections.description: Competencies for BAs and PMs: requirements analysis, planning, research, and feature design.

collections.name: Technical Writer Persona
collections.description: Competencies for technical writers: documentation, content creation, and professional communications.

collections.name: Researcher Persona
collections.description: Competencies for researchers: comprehensive analysis, research workflows, and deep investigation.

collections.name: Architect Persona
collections.description: Competencies for architects: technical design, system analysis, and solution architecture.

collections.name: Project Manager Persona
collections.description: Competencies for project managers: planning, coordination, progress tracking, and workflow management.

collections.name: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
collections.description: Competencies for SRE: infrastructure, monitoring, deployment, performance, security operations.

collections.name: Tester / QA Engineer
collections.description: Competencies for testers: test coverage, test architecture, performance testing, quality assurance.

collections.name: Git Specialist / DevOps
collections.description: Competencies for Git workflow management, branch operations, and repository automation.

collections.name: STRAF AI Agents
collections.description: AI agent execution and management: spawn background agents, direct execution, and process management with AWS Strands SDK.

collections.name: All Competencies
collections.description: Complete collection including all available competencies. Use this for maximum capability and full OLAF feature access.

metadata.description: Competency collections define groupings of competencies for different personas and use cases
notes: Collections with locked=true cannot be edited or deleted
The 'core' collection is always mandatory and cannot be modified
Users can create custom collections by running create-competency-collection.ps1
Users can select collections by running select-competency-collection.ps1
Each collection is a named grouping that generates a competency index
